Karl Wright wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Heritrix 1.5 runs out of memory for us when we have about 1700 domains.
>     The admin UI also seems to have a limit where (at some point) you
> get an error if you save a job that has too many seeds.
>
> We are trying to decide whether to migrate to 1.8, and this would be a
> key reason to do it.  Can somebody there describe what sorts of changes
> were made to 1.8 to address the two problems above, and what the new
> limits are?

You should move to 1.8.  Lots of improvements including the areas you 
mention above.  Best place for difference between releases is the 
release notes.  We spend some time trying to make sure they're of use 
answering the question, "Whats changed between releases?" (Usually they 
are available of the main page but they seem to be broken at the 
moment.  Let me try and fix).

St.Ack
